reviews.review: its not bad, you see a lot of dumb shit and get harassed a lot though

希望能出个可选择的和谐补丁，在社会主义氛围下。对于大量的血，确实有点恶心。希望能在今后推出能和谐一点比如一堆死猪大量血迹的停尸房。
更喜欢用纯粹的氛围渲染的恐怖，而不是依靠大量肉块，尸块，血迹恶心人来渲染氛围。
如果不考虑可选择的和谐DLC，那对不起，广电那群老头子那关，真的过不去。
对于有晕血现象的我，虽然我很喜欢这个游戏题材，玩法。但是对不起，这和那些晕3D玩家的感觉一样难以克服。
不说要改成第五人格一样的幼儿园，但是也请对国内一些小众晕血玩家考虑一下。大面积红色死猪看起来真的挺恶心而不是恐怖。
almost 700hr on record.... still a fun game

做人被鬼玩，做鬼被人玩。摸清套路之后这个游戏一点都不恐怖，玩多了也就那样，能不能做恐怖一些？做的有氛围一些？

Hello Dead By daylight Devs. I have about 74 hours in your game on steam. Honestly I loved your game because of its unique game play and amazing graphics but sadly as of right now I could not recommend it to anyone. For a game that is a multiplayer game your match making is honestly horrible. I'm not even talking about the ranked matching making i'm just talking about trying to que up with friends, which at the time of me writing this is virtually impossible. I feel as a multiplayer game you need to fix your core issues with the game before pumping out more killers, survivors, and maps. Until you fix this matching making issue sadly I will have to stop playing and will instruct none of my friends to purchase this otherwise great game. I hope you will see my comment and respond about your plans to fix this dire issue. Sincerely Troy.﻿

Some people say this game is bad, in some ways it is. If you are looking for a good time with friends and do not get angry easily, then you'll love this game. You can mess around with friends for hours of entertainment. If you are someone who takes things really seriously, I would not recommend this game for you. It can be extremely frustrating. Overall, I've got my 20 bucks worth out of this game for sure.

Значит наиграл я на втором аккаунте 1.5к часов и его забанили просто так, но обзор я сделаю.
Итак, что мы имеем:
*Пошли минусы*
1.Маньяки=хост, тоесть если у этого идиота будет пинг 200 вам будет не очень комфортно играть,а вот у этого засранца всё будет чики пупень.
2.Баги убирают, но появляются новые.
3.добавляют кучу бессмысленных патчей.
4.особенно часто попадаются КЕМПЕРЫ.
*Пошли плюсы*
1.русская локализация на высоте, но при этом с новыми перками и подношениями приходится ждать русификации неделю, а то и больше.
2.музыкальное сопровождение заставляет тебя понервничать.
3.динамика на высоте, всё ооочень плавно.
4.затягивает на долго, тоесть за все те 1.5к часов на старом аккаунте я ниразу не сталкивался с тем, что не хочу в неё играть
*В общем*
В игре есть как плюсы так и минусы

初心者キラーはフルパにボコボコにされて死ぬほど煽られるゲームです。
詳しくは他の方の不評レビューを見てください。
このゲーム自体はすごく面白いです。ただ、民度は私が今までやってきたオンライン対戦ゲームで一番マナーの悪いプレイヤーが多いかもしれません。キラーをやると、特に低ランク帯では弱いとわかるだけですぐ煽りをはじめるサバイバーがほぼ確実にいるので、最初はサバイバーをプレイすることを激しくオススメします。

Dead by Daylight

Definitiv eines meiner Lieblingsspiele. Man muss allerdings dazu sagen, dass es eine Hassliebe ist. Dieses Spiel kann sehr viel Spaß machen wenn man es mit Freunden spielt und ein faires Spiel gegen den Killer hat.

Das Spiel ist simple: Man startet zu 4. auf einer Map mit 7 Generatoren wovon man 5 Stück reparieren muss damit die Ausgangstore mit Strom versorgt werden und geöffnet werden können. Sollten 3 Spieler sterben erscheint die Luke durch welche der letzte Survivor entkommen kann, wenn man sie denn vor dem Killer findet. Findet der Killer die Luke kann er sie schließen wodurch automatisch alle Generatoren angehen und die Ausgänge mit Strom versorgt werden. Sollte es dazu kommen stehen die Chancen für den Survivor leider ziemlich schlecht, da die Ausgänge leider oftmals nah zusammen stehen.

Ziel für den Killer ist es natürlich, dass alles zu verhindern und die Survivor an Haken zuhängen und zu töten.
Der Killer hat dabei die Möglichkeit die Generatoren zu schlagen, damit der Generatorenfortschritt langsam zurück geht.

Beide Seiten haben viele verschiedene Perks um sich das Spiel zu erleichtern. Es gibt viele Maps, Killer und Survivor. Die Maps stehen jedem zur Verfügung während die meisten Survivor und Killer per DLC gekauft werden müssen. Die Perks kann man jedoch für die Währung "Scherben" im wöchentlichen Schrein erwerben, ebenso wie Killer / Survivor die NICHT lizenziert sind. Allerdings sind die Killer / Survivor nicht all zu günstig weshalb es ein wenig Geduld benötigt.

Die Vielfalt an Killern/Survivorn/Perks/Maps ist für mich ein großer Pluspunkt auch wenn die Killer und Survivor überwiegend Kostenpflichtig sind.

Der Spielspaß kann nur sehr schnell vorbei sein, wenn der Killer anfängt jemanden zu tunneln / zu campen. Das Spiel ist dahingehend leider ziemlich unbalanced. Es betrifft aber auch die Killer wenn man gerade das Spiel beginnt die erste Jagd durchführt und plötzlich bereits 2 Generatoren angehen. Genrush ist ebenso nervig für die Killer wie camping / tunneln für die Survivor. Ich hoffe einfach, dass sich da in Zukunft was dran ändert.

Fazit:

Ich würde das Spiel jedem empfehlen der sich überlegt hat das Spiel zu kaufen. Die verschiedenen Killer / Survivor / Perks bieten einem genug Abwechslung und mit Freunden macht das Spiel noch mehr Spaß.

10 Février 2021, une abomination. Je pensais vraiment mais vraiment que ce jeu ne pourrait pas être pire. La mise à jour d'aujourd'hui est un pur désastre. HUD INGOBLE, niveau animation nous sommes retournés 10 ans en arrière, le pire dans tout ça : IL Y A EU UN PTB UN PUTAIN DE PTB, j'ai lu les retours de ce dit "PTB", c'était full bad feedbacks, mais ils en ont eu RIEN A FOUTRE. Vraiment je l'ai toujours dit, dead by daylight c'est un jeu de merde, mais là on est passé à un stade ou les mots ne peuvent plus le décrire. Entre la communauté super toxique, les bugs de connexion, les mécaniques de jeu comme le fameux "tunnel, facecamp camp", ou encore les soucis de balance en Survivant en Survive with Friend qui sont totalement broken ( et j'en abuse bien du SWF), ça passait encore, on pouvait s'amuser si on avait le niveau, mais LA c'est plus possible. En tout cas bien joué Dead by Daylight. J'espère que vous allez réagir car là, c'est une Death Garden que vous nous faites. Déçue.
I think they did a pretty good job so far. For the best experience, play after trying to play Civ.
Pretty good job so far, riveting and competitive against Civ 5.

Bought this game last year (2017) during the sale (Winter, I guess) and started playing a few weeks back.

Here's what I've noticed:

As a [i][b]survivor[/b][/i], when you play any character for the first time, you ARE going to die. 
And die in stupid ways you can't imagine - it's kinda sad and hilarious at the same time. 
There's a learning curve time of roughly 10 hours to get into the mechanics of the game and understand how to take advantage of the killer's first-person view. If you're lucky, you'll jump into a match with experienced survivor players who would help you out, but even that doesn't assure that you'll escape alive. 
Once you start levelling up your characters by investing bloodpoints in the bloodweb, you'll start doing a little better than before (of course, you need the in-game meta perks like Claudette's self heal - so you should start with Claudette and unlock her teachable for the rest of your survivor characters). Things start getting a little easier to navigate from there as you start learning how to juke the killers. The scare factor does wear off a bit once you put in the hours, but there are moments when you will be spooked out of your wits and those moments are pretty exciting.

As a [i][b]killer[/b][/i], you are going to be owned by the survivors in the beginning.
They will finish repairing generators before you manage to hook a single one of them, and all four of them will escape alive more often than not, since they're almost always connected via Discord. So, there's a learning curve here too. And I suggest you to look for tutorial videos online of gamers who are good at the killer/s that pique your interest. It helped me a lot, and I'm sure it will help you. HybridPanda and Tru3Ta1ent stream good stuff on their Twitch and have a good collection of videos that you can watch on YouTube. Putting pressure on the survivors to make them choices like saving a hooked teammate, or doing a gen and sacrificing his/her life is really satisfying and the game really comes alive here. Being the chaser, instead of being chased, is a heady feeling and this is quite exciting as well.

However, the game isn't as rosy and there are a good number of toxic survivors and killers alike - survivors who would body block you, ragequit when you're about to hook them and teabag in exit areas, and killers who would camp around a hooked survivor till he/she is sacrificed. You can barely do much to counter this, so I suggest you to not be too emotionally invested when you're playing, otherwise you will be frustrated a lot. In addition to that, the lobby wait time as a killer is a massive issue these days even though there are a good number of players playing the game. Sometimes it takes almost 15-20 minutes for a game to start, because survivors have no patience to wait for a few seconds and let the ping settle down before making a judgment on the network connectivity.

The DLCs are pretty cool and the devs are coming up with really cool killers and survivors. My favorite DLC killers would be The Spirit, Pig, Ghost Face, Mike Myers and the Doctor.

Suggest you to get this game during sale, play at least 10-15 hours to have a grip on the game and its mechanics. Don't get sucked into the "gg ez" toxicity post-match and you'll fall in love with the game.

The game gets an 8.5/10 from me.

玩了30个小时了，说一下整体感觉，对电脑的配置要求不高这点挺好，游戏模式也很有趣，但致命的地方是dlc屠夫和非dlc屠夫的强度简直是无法比，尤其是“门徒”这个屠夫，简直可以说是变态，新手完全没有游戏体验，其他dlc屠夫也有些过分的离谱，还有一点就是这个游戏的排位机制很奇怪，总的来说就是上段难入登天，下分易如反掌，而且打路人局部分玩家为了所谓的“保分”刚有一点局势不利就直接拔线断网，这种情况真的愈演愈烈，本来只是一个游戏，弄成这样真没意思。总的来说这款游戏比较适合四个小伙伴一起开黑愉快玩耍，单排的话不建议入手，玩了30个小时我都后悔买了！

I was talked into buying this game by a friend. My friend and I downloaded the game then loaded in and grouped up together then we entered the queue. We waited for about 15 minutes with no match ups, while we were waiting for the match my friend looked up the amount of players who were online in the game at that point in time which was about 10000 apparently. I was very annoyed so I closed the game, uninstalled it then applied for a refund.

apesar de ser uno de los juegos que les he gastado mas horas y dedicacion tengo que admitir que al tener red shell me desencanto demasiado , no puede ser que nos pongan un spyware y no decirlo , aparte que le falta optimizacion en algunos mapas al momento.
 lo bueno es que ahora estan constantemente balanceando asesinos y sobrevivientes , ademas de agregarlos y implementar mecanicas para que el juego sea diferente tanto para tus team mates como para el killer . tambien agregan constatenmente public beta test para probar los posibles cambios y balancear o cambiar radicalmente las perks muy tier 1 o demasiado low tier.
en si me gusta demasiado pero el red shell puesto y recientemente sacado es algo que me rompe el corazon con el juego tan grandioso que es, si no fuera por eso seria 10/10 (si arreglaran los bajones de fps en ciertos mapas) pero creo que al traicionar a tus propios jugadores no merece buena clasificacion.

Tahle je dobrá píčovina ale když si řeknu že to nebude sranda tak tu hru vypnu Silveráka protože měhrozně sere ten píčus je kurva neoholenej, macatej a mám ho šmakózního, Tohle zkácím dneska večer vedle krbu, jenže nemám krb. Takže si postavim stan, vedle dálnice u rybníka na Silverákovo zahradě. Udělá se mu opar i beďař na prdeli u řitního otvoru. No tak to bude velká píčovina. Je tohle vůbec smysluplný ? Já si on zahulím. Ráno jsem se kouknul dovnitř kalendáře, jenže nemám kalendář. Vánoce byli depresivní protože nemám adventní medicínu protože nemám na to lžíci. Léto je fakt horké jako Imikovo myš když hraje heartstone nebo sračku. Dneska sním kostku medu smíchánou s horkou čokoládou a taky si dám chlepa namazaný cukrem, to bude šmakozní pochutina. Recenze je Grunovo výtvor, Doufám že budu dneska spát v 8 ráno, ale nemám spacák..

[h1][b]Overall Rating: 6.5/10[/b][/h1]

Dead by Daylight is an amazing concept, and in certain circumstances the actual strength of that concept can shine through. However, it suffers what many of the larger and more popular communities suffer from and that's a very [b]toxic[/b] playerbase. The game rewards behaviors that can easily ruin the game for newer player and frustrate players of old. 

[h1][b]PROS[/b][/h1]
[olist]
    [*]Innovative Concept - Allows for very enjoyable situations when paired with the right people.
    [*]Balance - This is iffy, but I [b]personally[/b] feel a lot of the character's strengths and weaknesses really play well together.
    [*]Level Design - Again this is inbetween, but there are some levels that compliment the general concept really well.
    [*]Movie References - There is just something special about being chased by the man in the Kirk mask.
    [*]Teamwork - It's a game meant to be played in a cooperative spirit, and the game feels like every decision you make can be weighed against your team's chance of surviving. 
[/olist]

[h1][b]CONS[/b][/h1]
[olist]
    [*]Toxic Playerbase - Many campers, trollers, griefers, and general unsportsmanlike behavior.
    [*]Hitboxes - These can be really iffy, could be due to conncection(lag), but it feels like they are often just wrong.
    [*]Seasons - The rank is reset every 'season' which leads to high ranks ending up back with newbies, it turns into a massacre for a good week or two after.
    [*]Lag - There are no professionally hosted servers, everything is hosted by the killer which leads to insane bouts of lag and connection jitter.
    [*]Glitches - Things such as ending up on the wrong side of the pallet or losing items due to connection dropping.
    [*]Camping - Yes, it's so bad it warrants its own con. You [b]will[/b] get camped, and you [b]will[/b] lose points/items/pips as a result of it.
    [*]Rage Quitters - These people will wreck your games when you encounter them. The game works on a basis of 4 people - 5 generators. If someone leaves midgame you don't lose a required generator as you would if they disconnected while loading. So you get stuck with three or even two people stuck having to do five generators by themselves. 
[/olist]

So, I know there are a lot of cons and some of them have ruined many other games. But, despite those cons I still feel like the game is fun every now and again. Yes, there are matches that are ruined by the community, yes there are people that disconnect (rage quit) and kill your chances of survival. But, I think it's a good game to pickup especially if you have a solid group of friends to play it with. This isn't really a game to play alone, it's definitely a game that's better with a group of friends.

Рублевая игра, рублевый геймплей.

В этой игре очень интересный геймплей ( за выживших особенно). За убийцу тоже интересно ,но не страшно и не очень напряжённо. Это одна из тех игр в которой не обязательно донатить на DLC как в GTA ради денег или др. играх. Сами DLC стоят не очень дорого ,но приносят за это много контента. Игрок который купил все DLC отличается от обычного только тем, что получает персонажей со своими способностями и может этим пользоваться ,но при этом игру он не факт ,что победит ,а решает всё умение. Всем советую эту игру! 5 звёзд (из 6. Баги имеют место быть.)
dead by BUGlight

Я наиграл в эту игру 19 часов и всё . . .
Потому что потом вылезает очень увлекательная и забавная казалась бы на первый взгляд надпись: "Нет соединения с онлайн службами, повторите попытку позже". Ладно, казалось бы, запущу игру потом, но хрен там ! Спустя полтора часа всё та же надпись, и прикол в том, что она появляется на протяжении всего дня, а пропадает после семи-семи с половиной часов по МСК, меня такой расклад очень смутил, ибо тратить деньги за такое мне не очень приятно, стал искать решение в интернете, у людей та же проблема, и исправить её никак нельзя ! Вылезает эта надпись из за того, что сервера игры связаны с Амазоном, чьи сервера на данный момент не по плану блокируются нашим рукожопым РКН, больше всего бесит отношение разработчиков к RUS комьюнити, ведь если бы они заботились о нас, то давно бы что-то сделали для решения этой проблемы. Однако после того, как вы прождали over дох*я тысячелетий, и игра всё таки запустилась, вас ждёт неистовый оргазм, котрый вы не испытывали никогда раньше, если бы не бред с серверами, то я бы отсосал этой игре, но оценку-то ставят за саму игру, а не за какие-то проблемы с ней, которые есть у всех эпизодично.
"Dead by Daylight" я рекомендую, но только в том случае, если вы готовы *баться с ней так же, как и я.
Деньги однако всё таки жалко, заплатил чтобы играть, а не ждать, пока сервера заработают . . .

玩了300个小时了，就按照这300个小时在说，这款游戏是值得推荐，值得入手的一款游戏，黎明杀机制作组对国人玩家很是照顾，虽然这个游戏在刚玩的时候很恐怖，但只要多玩玩，就会发现，这个游戏是真的欢乐，简而言之，这是个好游戏，值得入手推荐。

игра хрень из за отсутствия баланса

C'est la première fois que je demande à me faire rembourser..
Les gens ne veulent pas se mettre avec vous, partent sans parler.
De plus, il y a un clair déséquilibre entre le chasseur et le chassé. Impossible de terminer une partie correctement.
Pas de communication avec les autres joueurs (sauf chat écrit), et très peu d'indications en jeu.
J'appelerais bien ce jeu "Victime Simulator".
Et pourtant, je laisse très rarement des commentaires négatifs. Je ne suis peut-être juste pas fait pour ce jeu, mais dans la façon dont il est vendu, il ne correspond pas.

Excellent jeu coop entre amis.

Gameplay facile à prendre en main, ambiance vraiment sympa pour les amateurs de films d'horreurs Old School. Les DLC payants sont vraiment géniaux pour les amateurs du genre, les originaux également.
Même si le gameplay reste le même chaque partie peut être différente, chaque survivant possède des compétences qui peuvent nous pousser à tenter de jouer d'une manière différente (altruistme, soigneur, coop boosté), 
Les seuls points négatfis à mùon sens sont quelques problèmes en ligne, rage quit de joueurs qui foutent en l'air la partie des autres, tueurs qui campent de façon abusive (on report assez souvent dans ces cas là), ça peut vite agacer les plus impatients.
Mais le jeu est vraiment super fun entre amis, il y'a souvent des nouveautés et des events sympas.
垃圾，尤其是匹配制度，游戏加载非常慢，还卖82那么贵。而且这游戏对新人态度极差，入坑需谨慎！
Разрабы придумали хорошую игру, но куча багов и токсиков оставляют желать лучшего.

Playing this game since over 2000 hous now. And now I'm done with it since the update from 19.07. The dev changed a lot of Killer and Survivor perks because of "the meta" plays. So basicaly they stole the favorite survivor and killer perks and rendered many of them useless while boosting other perks. And guess what I don't even mind that it would be totaly ok. But the issues are the new Timings. They extended gen times while boosting gen regression perks. Not a good choice. Since the updated every Killer runs 4 out of the same 6 ani gen perks and wins everytime. This makes it nearly impossible to "win" a game. Every game is the same killer protecting gens 24/7 while still beeing able to hit, run and hook. Bevore the killer had to make a choise if the chase is worth it or if the nearly finished gen needs protection. Now he can do both. Every game takes ages is anoying and not even good for survivors. All loops will be done in the first half of the game. And after that you have no longer to chance to chase properly. This again result in that the team has less time for doing gens. Fix your trash game devs. Nobody will play it if you continue your way.
